Package dev.galactic.star.database.impl.objects

Class Table

java.lang.Object
dev.galactic.star.database.impl.objects.Table
public class Table extends Object
The class that has all the metadata and information relating to the Database table.
Author:
PrismoidNW

  • Method Details

    • addColumn

      public Table addColumn(Column... columnToAdd)
      Takes a var args of the Column class.
      Parameters:
      columnToAdd - are the columns you want to add to the table.
      Returns:
      Table so that it can be used for method chaining.

    • getColumns

      public HashMap<String,Column> getColumns()
      Gets a list of all the columns in the current table.
      Returns:
      A hashmap of the name with the object of the Column class.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of the table.
      Returns:
      a String of the name of the table.

    • getPrimaryKey

      public String getPrimaryKey()
      Gets the primary key of the table.
      Returns:
      The primary key. By default, the primary key is a blank String unless set so it returns "" if not set. Else returns the primary key.

    • setPrimaryKey

      public Table setPrimaryKey(String primaryKey)
      Sets the primary key and updates it.
      Parameters:
      primaryKey - of the table.
      Returns:
      Instance of the class for method chaining.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a human-readable String for debugging purposes. It prints the table, its values, and its columns.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String of the table contents.
